RSA
Example #1
public key = (79,3337)
private key = (1019,3337)
plaintext = HELLO ALICE
ciphertext = 0000028500001689000019030000190300000251000013790000054100001903000007250000147900001689
Example #2 (generated public & private key, n is 8 bit)
public key = (3, 44719)
private key = (29531, 44719)
plaintext = HELLO ALICE
ciphertext = 00000154960000015476000003650500000365050000001130000003276800000063110000036505000003126500000324490000015476

DiffieHellman
n = 97
g = 5
x = 36
y = 58
secret = 75
